text: HemitrullusGorochov AV (2001) Zoosystematica Rossica 9(2): 332. is a genus of crickets in the family Gryllidae and tribe Gryllini. Species can be found in Indo-China.Orthoptera Species File (Version 5.0/5.0: retrieved 26 August 2019) == Species == Hemitrullus includes the following species: * subgenus Atrullus Gorochov, 2001 **Hemitrullus banlungi Gorochov, 2001 * subgenus Hemitrullus Gorochov, 2001 **Hemitrullus changi Gorochov, 2001 \- type species * subgenus Peratrullus Gorochov, 2001 **Hemitrullus alboapex Gorochov, 2001 **Hemitrullus nigroapex Gorochov, 2001 **Hemitrullus perspicillaris Ingrisch, 1987 == References == == External links== * Category:Ensifera genera Category:Gryllinae Category:Orthoptera of Indo-China
title: Hemitrullus
